reviewText: Awesome DVD. Totally worth the money.

Bought this for my husband, but it's one of those a wife can watch (if you like flyfishing and beautiful scenery) and enjoy together.  I got out with my husband when he fishes -- and I do some flyfishing myself -- although I haven't the endurance or accuracy he has.  Great film -- highly recommend this.
Jealous and makes me want to go fish all these great places! Well-made and video footage is beautiful! A great new fly-fishing video.
